record.title: UNANIMOUS-CONSENT AGREEMENT--H.R. 1591

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the previous order with respect to the timing of the three rollcall votes this morning be modified to provide that the votes be delayed until 11:45 a.m., under the same sequence as previously ordered and the other provisions as previously ordered; that following the 60 minutes of debate, the amendments be set aside and that Senator Coburn then be recognized to debate his pending amendments and that all other provisions remain in effect.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
